tool_description: API for leboncoin, a popular French classifieds website. This API allows users to access various functionalities related to listings on the platform.

api_list.name: SingleOffer
api_list.description: Retrieve a single offer by its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the classified listing.

api_list.name: PhoneNumber
api_list.description: Get the phone number of any listing on leboncoin.

required_parameters.name: list_id
required_parameters.description: The listing ID. For example, in the URL www.leboncoin.fr/voitures/2019289966.htm, the ID is 2019289966.

api_list.name: Location
api_list.description: Get location information related to listings.
